categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Rassus was a male individual who served as a major in the Galactic Empire. During the Galactic Civil War, Rassus served under Colonel Shakara Nuress aboard the Star Destroyer Pursuer. He continued to serve the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing and given command of the Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier Aerie during the Battle above Catadra.
